name: Healthcare
description: Healthcare is the practice of maintaining and improving health through the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of disease, injury, and other physical and mental impairments.

name: Education
description: Education is the process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits. Educational methods include teaching, training, storytelling, discussion, and directed research.

name: Finance
description: Finance is the study of money, banking, credit, investment, and the management of financial assets.

name: Technology
description: Technology is the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry.

name: Manufacturing
description: Manufacturing is the process of converting raw materials into finished goods.

name: Retail
description: Retail is the process of selling goods to consumers.

name: Transportation
description: Transportation is the movement of people and goods from one place to another.

name: Energy
description: Energy is the ability to do work.

name: Agriculture
description: Agriculture is the production of food, fiber, and other products from plants and animals.

name: Mining
description: Mining is the extraction of minerals and other geological materials from the earth.
